sentence: Include more whole grains and legumes in your meals
explained: Include more whole grains (Foods like brown rice and oats that support heart health and digestion) and legumes in your meals

sentence: Avoid sugary snacks and processed desserts
explained: Avoid sugary snacks and processed desserts

sentence: Eat green leafy vegetables daily to reduce cholesterol
explained: Eat green leafy vegetables (Vegetables like spinach and kale that are rich in fiber (Carbohydrate that helps digestion and controls blood sugar levels) and nutrients) daily to reduce cholesterol

sentence: Reduce salt and saturated fat intake
explained: Reduce salt and saturated fat (Type of fat that raises cholesterol and increases heart disease risk) intake

sentence: Add omega-3 rich foods like flaxseed to your diet
explained: Add omega-3 rich foods like flaxseed to your diet

sentence: Increase daily fiber intake with fruits and vegetables
explained: Increase daily fiber (Carbohydrate that helps digestion and controls blood sugar levels) intake with fruits and vegetables

sentence: Switch from white bread to whole grain bread
explained: Switch from white bread to whole grain bread

sentence: Drink water instead of sugar-sweetened beverages
explained: Drink water instead of sugar-sweetened beverages

sentence: Avoid processed foods and cook meals at home
explained: Avoid processed foods (Foods with added preservatives or ingredients, often low in nutrients) and cook meals at home

sentence: Eat fatty fish like salmon twice a week
explained: Eat fatty fish like salmon twice a week

sentence: Take Metformin 500mg with breakfast and dinner
explained: Take metformin (A drug used to manage high blood sugar in type 2 diabetes) 500mg with breakfast and dinner

sentence: Start Atorvastatin 10mg once daily after dinner
explained: Start atorvastatin (A medication used to lower cholesterol levels) 10mg once daily after dinner

sentence: Continue Lisinopril 10mg every morning
explained: Continue lisinopril (A drug used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure) 10mg every morning

sentence: Take Amlodipine at the same time each day
explained: Take amlodipine (A medication used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain) at the same time each day

sentence: Refill your Levothyroxine prescription before it runs out
explained: Refill your levothyroxine (A hormone replacement for treating hypothyroidism) prescription before it runs out

sentence: Begin Hydrochlorothiazide for high blood pressure
explained: Begin hydrochlorothiazide (A diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and swelling) for high blood pressure

sentence: Do not skip your morning dose of Metformin
explained: Do not skip your morning dose of metformin (A drug used to manage high blood sugar in type 2 diabetes)

sentence: Take your cholesterol medication even if you feel fine
explained: Take your cholesterol medication even if you feel fine

sentence: Store your medications in a cool, dry place
explained: Store your medications in a cool, dry place

sentence: Ask your pharmacist if your medications can be taken together
explained: Ask your pharmacist if your medications can be taken together

sentence: Begin weekly cognitive behavioral therapy sessions
explained: Begin weekly cognitive behavioral therapy (A talk therapy for managing anxiety, depression, and behavior) sessions

sentence: Practice mindfulness meditation each morning
explained: Practice mindfulness (A mental practice that involves focusing on the present moment) meditation each morning

sentence: Attend physical therapy for your lower back pain
explained: Attend physical therapy (A rehab therapy to restore movement and reduce pain) for your lower back pain

sentence: Try deep breathing exercises to reduce stress
explained: Try deep breathing exercises to reduce stress

sentence: Stretch for 10 minutes after waking up
explained: Stretch for 10 minutes after waking up

sentence: Join a group therapy session this weekend
explained: Join a group therapy session this weekend

sentence: Use a yoga app to improve flexibility
explained: Use a yoga app to improve flexibility

sentence: Walk for 30 minutes five days a week
explained: Walk for 30 minutes five days a week

sentence: Track your mood and symptoms daily
explained: Track your mood and symptoms daily

sentence: Listen to guided meditations before bedtime
explained: Listen to guided meditations before bedtime

sentence: Set a daily reminder to take your morning medication
explained: Set a daily reminder to take your morning medication

sentence: Log your meals in the app every evening
explained: Log your meals in the app every evening

sentence: Set an alarm to check your blood pressure daily
explained: Set an alarm to check your blood pressure daily

sentence: Enable push notifications for pill reminders
explained: Enable push notifications for pill reminders

sentence: Use a calendar to track therapy appointments
explained: Use a calendar to track therapy appointments

sentence: Place your pillbox next to your toothbrush
explained: Place your pillbox next to your toothbrush

sentence: Install a medication reminder app
explained: Install a medication reminder (A prompt to help remember when to take medications) app

sentence: Use sticky notes as visual medication prompts
explained: Use sticky notes as visual medication prompts

sentence: Create a checklist for daily health tasks
explained: Create a checklist for daily health tasks

sentence: Schedule weekly health summary reviews
explained: Schedule weekly health summary reviews

sentence: Schedule a follow-up visit in two weeks
explained: Schedule a follow-up (A scheduled check or appointment after initial treatment) visit in two weeks

sentence: Book your next appointment with the dietitian
explained: Book your next appointment with the dietitian

sentence: Call the clinic to confirm your lab test schedule
explained: Call the clinic to confirm your lab test schedule

sentence: Follow up on your blood test results next Monday
explained: Follow up on your blood test results next Monday

sentence: Prepare for your annual wellness check
explained: Prepare for your annual wellness check

sentence: Arrange a phone consultation after starting new medication
explained: Arrange a phone consultation after starting new medication

sentence: Visit the clinic to review your blood pressure readings
explained: Visit the clinic to review your blood pressure readings

sentence: Set a calendar event for your next check-up
explained: Set a calendar event for your next check-up

sentence: Discuss your therapy progress in your next session
explained: Discuss your therapy progress in your next session
